channel.title: How do I make a certain item drop when a player kills another player?
channel.description: I want to make it so whenever someone kills someone else they will drop a castlewars ticket. Can someone please tell me how to do this? This is a 317 server if that helps.

@4593125 wrote:

I want to make it so whenever someone kills someone else they will drop a castlewars ticket. Can someone please tell me how to do this? This is a 317 server if that helps.
